description:
http://anidb.net/ch72780 [Shalltear]`s disguise during Operation Gehenna.
http://anidb.net/ch72782 [Demiurge] assigned her as a reserve in order to avoid causing trouble with their operation against Eight Fingers. While she was observing from afar, she encountered http://anidb.net/ch77873 [Brain Unglaus], whom she defeated in the past but forgot due to memory loss.
name: Shalltear Bloodfallen
